activities:
1. BTE manufactures and sells computerized physio therapy equipment that is placed in EU and Swiss countries. This equipment has the ability to store personal information. At times BTE US support has access to this data during support activities. 
2. BTE provides services to employers for job classification and job placement. BTE performs physical employment testing to candidates to determine if they can physically and safely perform the needed job tasks. During employment if an employee is injured BTE also will provide testing to determine when the employees can safely return to work. Personal information is collected during all processes.
contacttitle1: Director of Customer Support and Information Management
corpofftitle1: Director of Customer Support and Information Management
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, France, Germany, Greece, Ireland, Italy, Poland, Spain, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Organization, client, customer and clinical trial (some BTE customers may participate in a clinical trial). All data has the potential for manual processing although this is not primary.
recoursemech: BTE will utilize the European Union (EU) data protection authorities (DPA) Panel and will cooperate and comply with the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC)
